channel.title: Nonbinary Game Jam
channel.description:
Hey all, I just found out about about a recent Nonbinary Game Jam. It's about making "a game with a nonbinary main character or discussing the nonbinary experience in some way". There was one TTRPG (as far as I can tell) that was submitted. But there were 15 total games, most of which were video games of some sort, with 8 playable in browser. Submission has closed and the the "voting" is happening now.
https://itch.io/jam/nonbinary-game-jam
I am going to check some of these out, especially "[enbuddies](https://itch.io/jam/nonbinary-game-jam/rate/410647)", the TTRPG entry.

Nonbinary Game Jam

A game jam from 2019-04-10 to 2019-05-02 hosted by Naomi Norbez. ~UPDATE~ This jam now has a Discord server! Thank you to Knickers PJ for making one! <3 Hello fellow gamemakers! I'm Naomi Norbez, a nonbinary (aka e
